note.p: Clergyman. Son of Stafford Henry Northcote. Married Hilda Cardew Farrar, 1881. Curate of St Margaret’s, Westminster, London.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office, RG11/3398/109/34)
Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1917 (Ancestry.com, accessed 6 April 2021)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 6 April 2021)
